subject: [Radiance-general] Pattern on tilted surfaces
body:
On 27 Mar 2008, at 11:05, Kai Babetzki wrote:

[...]
I think the simplest way is to keep the pattern material definition
and the
window (vertical or horizontal) polygon in one file and then move and
rotate
this file into place with xform:

!xform -rx 20 -t .... window_and_pattern.rad
!xform -rx 30 -rz 45 -t ... window_and_pattern.rad

There are some .cal files out there that allow a rotation argument
but you
have to define every angle of the glazing as a separate pattern.


Thomas
